Others: The match is set to be played in Hungary due to Belarus's UEFA ban.
Without fans in attendance, Belarus loses any home advantage.
Northern Ireland's next game is against Bulgaria on Tuesday.
The match will kick off at 7:45pm on Saturday, 12th October 2024.
The match will not be broadcast on UK TV channels.
Fans can watch the match live on the Viaplay International YouTube channel.
BBC Radio Ulster will broadcast the match on radio.
